channel.title: Ok i .jared my client. how can my mates join? please just say steps bottom
channel.description:
please
i have noip. but do i need to keep it open? or idk pls tell me

item.title: Ok i .jared my client. how can my mates join? please just say steps bottom
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

1: In jarred client there must be your no-ip (no 127.0.0.1) so client will know where to connect.
2:IF youâ€™re using no-ip instead of your IP address you obv. have to keep no-ip up.
